title: Is React Now a Full Stack Framework? And Other Dev News
author: Loraine Lawson
description: This week we look at React theories, how Claude generates artifacts for developers, the latest TypeScript release, and Project IDX.
cntitle: React 现在是全栈框架吗？以及其他开发者新闻
cndescription: 本周我们将探讨 React 理论、Claude 如何为开发者生成工件、最新 TypeScript 版本以及 Project IDX。
